column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ On the morning of April 24
column5: Phnom Penh Municipal Court Judge Keth Socheat announced the verdict on the case of Thai Srey Neang.------The online seller who faced ------‘sexual exploitation’------ charges for posts made on social media was given a 6 month sentence. She will serve a total of 2 months and 15 days
